summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Test Reports Module. All features working correctly - 12 equipment types displayed, create forms with equipment-specific fields, backend API CRUD operations, and 'Executive' changed to 'Management' in sidebar.
critical_code_review_comments: Test Reports page correctly displays all 12 equipment types with icons, names, descriptions
Each equipment card has 'New Report' and 'View' buttons with proper data-testid attributes
Create Report forms dynamically show equipment-specific fields based on equipment type
Report numbers auto-generated with format PREFIX/YEAR/NUMBER (e.g., TR/2026/0001, EP/2026/0001)
'Executive' label successfully changed to 'Management' in sidebar (visible to super_admin and CEO roles)
Backend API endpoints properly handle CRUD operations for test reports
Equipment-specific field configurations defined in EQUIPMENT_FIELDS object

success_rate.frontend: 100% (All UI tests passed - Test Reports page, Create forms, View reports list)

seed_data_creation: Created Earth Pit test report (EP/2026/0001) via UI automation for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Test Reports module fully functional. Created test report EP/2026/0001 during testing. Backend API tests cover all CRUD operations for test reports.

details: Test Reports menu item visible in Projects Dept sidebar
All 12 equipment types displayed: Transformer, Earth Pit, Energy Meter, MCCB, ACB, VCB, DG, Lighting, Lightning Arrestor, UPS, IR Thermography, Electrical Panel
Each card has icon, name, description
Each card has 'New Report' and 'View' buttons
Quick Overview section shows Equipment Types count (12)
Transformer Details section with equipment-specific fields
Test Results section with IR values, oil level, temperatures
Save as Draft and Save Report buttons
MCCB Details section with rating, frame size, poles, breaking capacity
Test Results section with trip test, contact resistance, mechanical operation
Earth Pit Details section with pit type, depth, soil type
Test Results section with earth resistance, soil resistivity, test method
'Management' label found in sidebar (line 769 in Layout.js)
CEO/Owner link visible under Management section for super_admin users
Shows table with Report No, Project/Site, Location, Test Date, Tested By, Status columns
